biotools.summary: Data analysis toolkit designed for large sets of gene expressions over various experiments. Includes methods for evaluating data sets, discovering informative genes that are differentially expressed across the classes, classifying the experiments using supervised learning algorithms, and clustering the genes using semi-supervised learning method.

bioschemas.name: ScoreGene
